This works and I'd say it's one of the easiest torrents I've ever installed.
There's actually this Install Manual.nfo file that you should get with this download that tells you exactly what to do to make it work, but if you're a noob, this is what you do:

1. Download the torrent.
2. Now you need Daemon Tools or whatever program can mount ISO files. And if you don't know what "mounting an ISO file" means or how Daemon Tools works at all, I suggest you look this up first before downloading any torrents at all.
3. Open Daemon Tools and mount the ISO file found in your downloads folder in 'FIFA 07'.
Normally, the setup should now show up, but no worries if it doesn't, just go to Computer -> find the CD drive to where you mounted the ISO file -> right click and 'explore/open'-> double click AutoRun.exe and the setup should come up, now you just follow the instructions. 
When asked for serial, use 6ZNW-C4TP-NN2X-DNNS-2RLD
4. Now you have the game installed, but you still need to apply the crack which can be found on the CD drive where you mounted the ISO file. It's the same drive you already explored/opened and started AutoRun. This time you look for the 'Crack' folder.
5. Open the 'Crack' folder and copy&paste fifa07.exe to your game installation folder. Usually Computer -> main hard drive (in my case Vista C:) -> Program Files -> EA SPORTS -> FIFA 07.
Don't worry about the other file called rld-f07.exe. It's just the keygen you could've also used to get the serial, but I already wrote the working serial so you don't need keygen.
6. Play the game! 
If you do everything I told you, you should face no problems at all. It works because I just did it myself and the game works fine :)

Also, in game when you get to select the language (it should show English as first option), select the one you want and press ENTER, it goes into the game.

I hope I helped.
